content: dive into the whimsical world of crochet with the narwhal squish pattern this adorable 3-dimensional narwhal is perfect for beginners looking to create a charming amigurumi friend worked in the round this pattern includes detailed written instructions and a video tutorial for extra guidance crochet your way to a delightful narwhal companion with this easy-to-follow pattern **unique features-** easy level pattern for beginners super squishy for extra cuddles written pattern with video tutorial for extra support **materials needed-** us-l 7 0 mm hook - **furls** https //tidd ly/4l6y8yy 280 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/45trfs4 6 - super bulky 12 30 cm worsted or bulky weight black yarn 22mm **safety eyes** https //amzn to/3bbr3nk 10 round microbead pillow blue - **amazon** https //amzn to/3arh99y **stitch markers** https //amzn to/2hzvzbb
